description: The original contract mentioned repairs to the White Head Wharf as done in part by Canada Buys.

# Tender for White Head Wharf Repairs
[![](/data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGg...)](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14334969?extsite=MTQzMzQ5NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Notice Details
| **Field** | **Value** | **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | `WS3703770843` - `Doc3704095952` | Amendment Number | `1` |
| Solicitation Number | `WS3703770843` | Publication Date | `2022-10-31` |
| Tender Closing Date | `2022-11-22T14:00:00` | Last Amendment Date | `2022-11-02` |
| Expected Contract Start Date | `2022-11-14` | Expected Contract End Date | `None` |

## Tender Status
Originally, this tender was a Request for Proposal (RFP) with an open bidding process; however, it was cancelled.

## Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites proponents to submit bids for repairs to the wharf located on White Head Island, New Brunswick. The bid involves the furnishing of all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for the project. The planned contractor will be responsible for ensuring that the work is executed in accordance with the plans and specifications.

## Key Information
- Expected Contract Duration: 6 months
- Estimated Cost: between $500,001 and $1,000,000 (HST included)
- Low Price will be the selection criterion.
- All required documents shall be submitted in either English or French.

## Questions and Contact Information
All inquiries and questions should be directed to [tim](mailto:timothy.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
Please note that the submission deadline has been revised. The current deadline for receiving all required documents and bids is `2022-11-22T14:00:00`. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. [Learn More](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14334969?extsite=MTQzMzQ5NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Requirements
This bid involves Standard bid and contract security for the construction. Documents submitted in either official language
